name: verify_and_store_fact
description: Compound skill that verifies claims via web search before storing as facts. Enforces truth hygiene.

inputs.name: claim
inputs.description: The factual claim to verify and store

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Tags to apply to the stored fact

fallback_workflow.on_network_error: Queue for later verification, store as pending

workflow_steps: 1. check_rules - Check applicable rules for fact storage
2. web_search - Search for sources supporting the claim
3. extract_evidence - Read top sources and extract snippets
4. calculate_confidence - Score based on evidence quality
5. store_fact - Store with full evidence metadata
notes: This skill prevents the 'confident liar database' anti-pattern by requiring verification before high-confidence storage.
